== Background ==
Nathaniel Senff has been a full-time Web Developer/Musician/DBA/Web Content Creator/Soldier for ten years. Although he has dabbled with Ubuntu since breezy badger, he moved to a more permanent Ubuntu world with Karmic Koala.

Nathaniel joined the <nowiki>[[http://www.meetup.com/ubuntuvancouver/|Ubuntu Vancouver LoCo]]</nowiki> in December of 2009 and first presented at a General Meeting in March 2010. He is an avid user of the Ubuntu Desktop, Mythbuntu, Ubuntu Netbook, Ubuntu Server.

== Currently: ==
* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/CanadianTeam/Vancouver/UGH|UGH!]]</nowiki> - Exposing members of the local Ubuntu community to varies games available within the Ubuntu OS
* Support Saturdays - Helping greet people to the Support Saturday, provide user training, basic installs and run the triage booth
* Vancouver Ubuntu Game Design Group
* Ubuntu Multimedia
